## Checklist

### Required
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guide
- [ ] My changes follow the style guide
- [ ] I have tested my changes manually

### Documentation Updates
- [ ] Updated README.md (if adding/removing commands)
- [ ] Updated CLAUDE.md (if changing agents or commands)
- [ ] Updated version.json (file counts)
- [ ] Added/updated `## Changelog Entry` section in this PR body

### For New Components
- [ ] Follows the required structure from CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] Includes verification checkpoints (for workflows)
- [ ] Includes "Next Steps" section (for commands)
- [ ] Has clear success criteria

### For Deprecations
- [ ] Added deprecation notice at top of file
- [ ] Included migration guide
- [ ] Preserved legacy documentation
- [ ] Updated deprecatedFiles in version.json
